VoiceMessages.changelog:
# 1.1.3
* Cleaned up code somewhat
* Added configurable delay before stopping recording
* Added replying with voice messages

# 1.1.2
* Added support for Android versions below 10

# 1.1.1
* Fix some issues

# 1.1.0
* Make voice messages sendable in servers

# 1.0.5
* Fix voice messages getting sent in wrong channel if you switched channels before voice message is sent

# 1.0.4
* Made swiping up delete the voice recording

# 1.0.2
* Fix audio quality and add option to change it
